targets.query: select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"  fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_used") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"  fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_limit") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"  fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_free") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"  fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_free_limit") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"  fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("messages_published"), 1s) AS messages_published_rate FROM rabbitmq_overview WHERE host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)  fill(null)
SELECT mean("rabbitmq_cpu_usage") FROM "procstat" WHERE "process_name" = 'beam.smp' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("channels") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("consumers") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("queues") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("connections") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("exchanges") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages") AS "total_messages" FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_ready") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_unacked") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("messages_acked")) FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("messages_delivered")) FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("messages_published")) FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("messages") AS "messages" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_ack") AS "messages_ack" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_deliver") AS "messages_deliver" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_deliver_get") AS "messages_deliver_get" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_publish") AS "messages_publish" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_ready") AS "messages_ready" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_redeliver") AS "messages_redeliver" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT last("messages_unack") AS "messages_unack" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_ack_rate") AS "messages_ack_rate" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_deliver_rate") AS "messages_deliver_rate" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_deliver_get_rate") AS "messages_deliver_get_rate" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_publish_rate") AS "messages_publish_rate" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)
SELECT mean("messages_redeliver_rate") AS "messages_redeliver_rate" FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "vhost" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_in"), 10s) AS "published_in", non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_out"), 10s) AS "published_out" FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "type" = 'fanout' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "vhost", "exchange"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_in"), 10s) AS "published_in", non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_out"), 10s) AS "published_out" FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "type" = 'topic' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "vhost", "exchange"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_in"), 10s) AS "published_in", non_negative_derivative(last("messages_publish_out"), 10s) AS "published_out" FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "type" = 'direct' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "vhost"
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("buffered") FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval),  "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("free") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(context_switches), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(processes_forked), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(interrupts), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total_threads) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(sleeping) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(running) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(blocked) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(zombies) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("drop_in")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("drop_out")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_established)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_syn_recv)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_time_wait)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(close_wait)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(udp_socket)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("err_in")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("err_out")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes")) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"))  FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("writes")) AS "write iops" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("reads"), 1s) AS "read iops" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("weighted_io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

list.label: Container
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rabbitmq_node" WITH KEY = "host"
